name: Air URGA Flight Training Center
about: At Air URGA Flight Training Center, we offer comprehensive private and commercial pilot training programs, including PPL(A) and CPL(A) certifications. Our training includes 155 hours of ground theory and 45 hours of flying practice on a Cessna 172 for PPL(A), and additional instrumental and multiengine ratings for CPL(A). With professional instructors, modern facilities, and a comfortable learning environment, we provide a pleasant and unforgettable training experience. Our programs are designed to prepare students for successful careers in aviation, ensuring they meet the highest standards of safety and professionalism. We are committed to making your dream of becoming a pilot a reality.
services: ["PRIVATE PILOT TRAINING PPL(A)\nCOMMERCIAL PILOT TRAINING CPL(A)"]
